price: 不归信者说：“你们不要听这《古兰经》，你们应当扰乱诵经的声音，或许你们将获得胜利。”
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَا تَسۡمَعُواْ لِهَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَٱلۡغَوۡاْ فِيهِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَغۡلِبُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna kafarū lā tasmaʿū lihādhā al-qur'āni wal-ghaw fīhi laʿallakum taghlibūna
